doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/30/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/30/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Jim Levin, David Strah, and Christopher Lynn, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2.Discussion about how AIDS affects the classroom and the court roomCOMMERCIAL:National March on Washington for Lesbian and Gay Rights3. Discussion about convicting a man dying of AIDS who robbed a womanCOMMERCIAL:Human Rights Campaign4.NYC Council nominates Joseph Lisa for Health Committee Chair5.Washington Countdown, discussion about political candidates and celebrities who are supporting the March on Washington6. Interview with Susan Cavin and David Harris who talk about Non Violent Civil Disobedience7.Fundraiser for the March on Washington at The TunnelCOMMERCIAL:National March on Washington for Lesbian and Gay Rights8.News Watch, Initial trials of the drug DDC have been stopped because its too toxicBrendan O'Rourke, an AIDS patient, recieved a hug from Pope John Paul II9.Anti-Censorship groups have accuseed the National Broadcasting Company for refusing to air a commercial about the US Constitution because of veiled references to abortion and homosexuality10.GCN Sports, Information about NY Gay Pool League, Interleague meeting regarding gay bowling, and discussion about football strike among other things11.Lavender Health, Interview with West Cronk, NY Coordinator of the Names Project and NY Steering Committee for the March on Washington12.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1.Naming Names, criticism of the appointment of Judge Robert Bork for the Supreme CourtCOMMERCIAL:The Islanders Club2.Show Bitz, Discussion about revivial production of "Dreamgirls"COMMERCIAL: Gay Treasures3.Cindy and Leah talk about The Fetish Ball at The Limelight
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/30/1987]: September 1987
